description: When venturing out into the worst winter has to offer, these boots will keep you warm and dry. The rugged Bozeman Tall boots have thick neoprene insulation, use 100% waterproof construction and offer shoe level comfort, these aren’t your childhood gumboots.7mm Neo-Tech™ neoprene insulation is flexible and super warm.Lined with Bogs Max-Wick to keep feet dry.4-way stretch inner booty keeps feet comfy.Large handles make pulling the boots on a cinch.Snowshoe strap lug at the on the heel.Flex width insole adapts to foot width.Rebound cushioning under the heel and a contoured EVA footbed with DuraFresh bio-technology to prevent odour.Non-marking, chemical resistant rubber outsole features a self-cleaning tread that sheds mud and debris.
name: Bogs Bozeman Tall Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
